statements: SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location, description FROM HumanRightsIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Violence';
SELECT incident_date, location, reported_by FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE reported_by LIKE '%John%';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Violence' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Discrimination' ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT description FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_type = 'Harassment' LIMIT 3
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM HumanRightsIncidents GROUP BY reported_by HAVING total_reports > 2 ORDER BY total_reports DESC
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE location LIKE '%city%' AND description ILIKE '%abuse%' ORDER BY incident_date ASC
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, country, incident_description FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE country = 'United States';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, country FROM HumanRightsIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01' AND country = 'Syria';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents, country FROM HumanRightsIncidents GROUP BY country;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE country = 'Syria';
SELECT incident_date, country FROM HumanRightsIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM AidCoordination JOIN HumanRightsIncidents ON AidCoordination.incident_id = HumanRightsIncidents.incident_id;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS incident_count FROM HumanRightsIncidents GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE location = 'Syria';
SELECT organization_name, contact_email FROM AidOrganizations ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT incident_id, location, description FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT zone_name, country, threat_level FROM ConflictZones ORDER BY threat_level DESC, zone_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM HumanRightsIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT organization_id, organization_name, contact_email FROM AidOrganizations ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ConflictZones WHERE country = 'Syria' AND threat_level > 5;
SELECT zone_name, country, threat_level FROM ConflictZones WHERE zone_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, location, type FROM incidents ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT description FROM incidents WHERE type = 'Fire';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM victims WHERE status = 'Injured';
SELECT organization_id, name, location, contact_person FROM aid_organizations;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT incident_id, type FROM incidents WHERE type = 'Fire' ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM victims WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT organization_id, name, location, contact_person FROM aid_organizations WHERE location <> 'California';
SELECT distribution_id, organization_id, incident_id, distribution_date FROM aid_distribution ORDER BY distribution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents
SELECT location, incident_date FROM incidents
SELECT org_name, phone_number FROM aid_organizations
SELECT * FROM victims WHERE age > 30
SELECT aid_requests.id, org_name, request_date, status FROM aid_requests JOIN aid_organizations ON aid_requests.organization_id = aid_organizations.id
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT victims.victim_name, victims.age, incidents.location FROM victims JOIN incidents ON victims.incident_id = incidents.id WHERE victims.age > 18 ORDER BY victims.age DESC;

SELECT aid_organizations.org_name, aid_requests.request_date, aid_deliveries.quantity FROM aid_organizations JOIN aid_requests ON aid_organizations.id = aid_requests.organization_id JOIN aid_deliveries ON aid_requests.id = aid_deliveries.request_id WHERE aid_deliveries.quantity > 10 ORDER BY aid_requests.request_date DESC;
SELECT incidents.description, aid_requests.status FROM incidents LEFT JOIN aid_requests ON incidents.id = aid_requests.incident_id WHERE aid_requests.status = 'Pending';

SELECT incidents.id, victims.victim_name, aid_deliveries.delivered_date FROM incidents JOIN victims ON incidents.id = victims.incident_id JOIN aid_deliveries ON incidents.id = aid_deliveries.request_id WHERE victims.age < 18 ORDER BY aid_deliveries.delivered_date ASC;
